name: Suno-AI-BOT
description: A Telegram BOT for interacting with Suno AI's music generator by SunoAI API.

SUNO_COOKIE.description: Sign up on the suno.ai website and obtain your cookie. Refer README.md file to tutorial.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain one from discord dev page

REQUIRED_ROLE.description: role name of your discord server
